Approach

Our Design-driven approach

How people work and the environments they work in should be
closely aligned with your vision, needs and goals.

An efficient and flexible workplace contributes strongly to the overall success of your business.

Our design-driven approach results in creative, unique business and office interiors that delight and inspire – and never compromise on functionality.

It involves our team of specialists working closely with you to design your workplace solution. Our design will incorporate everything we discuss, from goals, teams and technology to people and personalities.

Our design excellence is underpinned by our project management and quantity surveying expertise to deliver on time and on budget, every time.

The advantages of working with STACK

For more than 20 years we’ve been designing workplaces that effortlessly blend creativity with functionality. We have a focus on great design through practicality, innovation and collaboration. Our promise is to always deliver our work on time and on budget and we work hard as a team internally and with other consultants to achieve this.

01

Experience

Proudly NZ-owned and operated, STACK’s multi-talented team brings together many years of local and international experience. We know what suits New Zealand workplaces and what makes them different – from our climate, to our people, to our plate tectonics.
